SELECT SBPT.ID_USER AS ID_TARGET , SU.USER_NM AS NM_TARGET , SU.PHONE_NO AS DS_TELNO , SU.EMAIL_DS AS DS_EMAIL , SMPM.ID_PUSH AS ID_PUSH , SMD.TP_OS AS TP_OS FROM SYS_BOARD_PUSH_TARGET SBPT INNER JOIN SYS_MOBILE_DEVICE SMD ON SBPT.ID_USER = SMD.ID_LOGIN_LAST INNER JOIN SYS_MOBILE_PUSH_MAPP SMPM ON SMD.ID_DEVICE = SMPM.ID_DEVICE INNER JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SBPT.ID_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE SBPT.ID_BOARD = #{ID_BOARD} AND SBPT.ID_SUB = #{ID_SUB}
AND SU.USER_ID = #{ID_USER}
